title: Science Information Search and Learning Effectiveness Program Using Virtual Reference Services

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific information retrieval skills and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Skill enhancement program for scientific information retrieval in limited smartphone environments, incorporating chat/IM-based education, co-browsing technology, and practice-oriented tasks to drive engagement and workplace application

learning_goals: Learners can perform scientific database search methods with 80% accuracy through chat/IM-based interactions.
Learners can demonstrate real-time scientific information search processes using cobrowsing tools.
Learners can apply information obtained from virtual reference services to solve practical problems in three or more practice assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
